sentences.sContent: It rained incessantly for the whole two weeks.
sentences.sContent_eng: It rained incessantly for the whole two weeks.
sentences.sCn: 雨不间断地下了整整两个星期。

sentences.sContent: The machines roar incessantly during the hours of daylight.
sentences.sContent_eng: The machines roar incessantly during the hours of daylight.
sentences.sCn: 机器在白天隆隆地响个不停。

sentences.sContent: It 's fine to make conversation and inquire into your friend's well-being — but don't ask incessantly.
sentences.sContent_eng: It 's fine to make conversation and inquire into your friend's well-being — but don't ask incessantly.
sentences.sCn: 你可以和朋友交流，关心以下她的近况，但别总是不停地询问。 㐺。
